title: Interconnection
description: A geographic area where BPS components are synchronized.

sections.title: Definition by NERC
sections.body_md: > A geographic area in which the operation of BPS components is synchronized such that the failure of one or more of such components may adversely affect the ability of the operators of other components within the system to maintain Reliable Operation of the Facilities within their control. When capitalized, any one of the four major electric system networks in North America: Eastern, Western, ERCOT, and Quebec.
